title: The utilisation of TDR from certificate under transfer procedure shall not be permissible, during transfer procedure
clause_text: The utilisation of TDR from certificate under transfer procedure shall not be permissible, during transfer procedure. The Commissioner may refrain the DRC holder from utilizing the DRC in the following circumstances:- Where the Commissioner has reason to believe that the DRC is obtained a) by producing fraudulent documents b) by misrepresentation,

source_pdf.text_snippet: The utilisation of TDR from certificate under transfer procedure shall not be permissible, during transfer procedure.
